name: RetroBots Online
description:
RetroBots Online is a fast-paced, multiplayer online platformer game in which robots battle for supremacy! Choose a character and join the brawl!

Fast-Paced: Powerful weapons and high speed make for quick fights.

Multiplayer: Play with your friends on one computer pseudo-split screen or online between computers!

Customizable: Choose all six of your character's colors for a personalized experience.

Pick between five robots then fight on five different maps!

Hosting a server online requires port forwarding. You need to forward the port you specify when hosting. Default is 6511.

Find other players in the community to play online! Post a request to play, report a bug, suggest an addition or a change, or read the changelog in the community linked below.
